attributes.action: Reset school year, due to Covid, giving children a chance to learn & succeed
attributes.additional_details: Due to Covid all students have lost a minimum of 5 months learning and development that needs to be recovered for the future of society, the economy and their mental well-being/self esteem
attributes.background: Tell schools to reset 2019-2020 academic year

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319171
